home.title: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors!
home.description: Here you choose your input device.
home.rules: Rock beats scissors, scissors cut paper, paper wraps rock.

mousegame.description: This is the mouse input mode, click on the image for your choice: Rock, Paper or Scissors.

keyboardgamecomponent.description: This is the keyboard input mode, press the key for your choice: Rock (R), Paper (P), Scissors (S).

cameragame.descriptionA: This is the webcam input mode, press the button to take a picture of your choice: Rock, Paper or Scissors.
cameragame.descriptionB: Take the picture and let the AI guess what you are holding!
cameragame.descriptionC: Then a random value will be chosen for the Computer. The winner will be determined based on the choices.

webaicomp.description: This is the webcam input mode, press the button to take a picture of your choice: Rock, Paper or Scissors.
